author: VABE

sections.description:
Chat with your customers via popular messaging apps. Increase your sales and make your clients happier.

Why?

  • Your customers use messaging apps. You use messaging apps. Communicate messaging apps! It’s simple.
  • Messaging apps are your customers’ personal space. Get closer to them.
  • This is the fastest and easiest way to support users.

Why VABE / Button?

  • It’s free.
  • It’s fast.
  • It’s powerful.
  • We listen to our users.

Supporting apps (updated constantly)

  • WhatsApp
  • Facebook Messenger
  • Telegram
  • Viber
  • Line
  • SnapChat
  • VK
  • Instagram
  • Email
  • SMS
  • Phone call
  • Links

Support

Have some questions? Just email us: vabeiomail@gmail.com.

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
There is some easy steps.

  • Install and activate plugin.
  • Go to VABE / Button section.
  • Generate widget.
  • Save.
  • Done!
sections.faq: Check https://vabe.io/button if you have questions.

short_description: FREE widget! Chat with your customers via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Telegram, Viber and other apps.
